Name: Soy (PH)
Description: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!

DescriptionLocalization.es: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine Sojaschote. Das Innere wird für viele Dinge verwendet, sogar für Fleischersatz!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.it: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Соевый стручок. Бобы этого растения используются для многих вещей, даже для изготовления искусственного мяса!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: A soy pod. The insides are used for many things, even faux meat!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 大豆可以用来做很多东西，甚至是植物肉！
